about_the_game:
GamePlay

Enjoy a sensual story while completing tricky puzzles!
Connect the numbers sequentially, using all of the squares on the board
After completing a puzzle, you will unlock a sexy new image and the next part of the story!
Can you complete every puzzle and meet all of the girls?!

Story Background

You were enjoying a cruise at sea when you suddenly fell overboard.
When you awoke, you found yourself washed up on a seemingly uninhabited island
There are many otherworldly plants and animals on this island.
Not to mention the strange and enchanting women who live here...

Characters

Meira:

Winged elves seem to be the natives of this strange island.
Meira is the first of their kind that you come into contact with.

Mewra:

She is the chief of the elves on this island, and is responsible for ensuring their survival by reproducing with outsiders.
She has very tanned skinned due to her active lifestyle on the island.

Camery:

Camery is a mermaid with legs! Aside from her cool skin, and webbed ears, she resembles a beautiful human woman in all respects...

Features

  • 20 sexy and erotic images of the four beautiful girls.
  • A fantastical erotic story with girls who have unique personalities.
  • You can skip the puzzles if you just want to enjoy the story. (Press Enter during a puzzle).
  • CG Gallery mode. (Click the left and right buttons next to the CG after completing a puzzle).

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains a large amount of extremely sexual content.
It may not be appropriate for all audiences.
Please make your own judgment before playing the game whether you meet the requirements for playing such games.
The story is purely fictional.
All characters appearing in this game are adults over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher; SteamOS
  • Processor: 4GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher; SteamOS
  • Processor: 4GHz+
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: A tourist ship you were on accidentally fell into the sea due to an accident. When you wake up, you seem to have been drifted by the sea to an uninhabited island. There are many strange plants on this uninhabited island, as if they are plants that do not exist in this world. What will happen there?
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Japanese*, Ukrainian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Korean*, Malay*
*languages with full audio support
